about.firstPoint: Frontend Engineer specializing in React, Next.js, Vue.js, Nuxt.js and TypeScript, with a strong product-focused approach to developing performant, accessible, and data-rich user interfaces.
about.secondPoint: Based in Berlin, I bring proven experience in delivering features for high-traffic applications, focusing on end-to-end UI ownership and architectural design.
about.thirdPoint: My background includes work with both cutting-edge frameworks like Nuxt and significant contributions to open-source projects. I am passionate about clean code and translating complex requirements into intuitive user experiences.
about.lastSentence: Scroll down to see my work!
